General.Name: Woodbois Ltd
General.Description: Woodbois Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the forestry and timber trading businesses in Gabon, Mozambique, Denmark, and Guernsey. It offers timber and carbon solutions; and veneer for construction and design applications. The company is also involved in shared services, financing, and property holding activities. The company was formerly known as Obtala Limited and changed its name to Woodbois Limited in March 2019. Woodbois Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.

6.Name: Ms. Sophie  Hunter
6.Title: Head of Sales, Marketing & Distribution for Africa
